channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Both pathways are blocked each side of road so pedestrians with buggy’s or wheelchairs have to go up the road, 8th December
item.description:
Henrietta street outside of premiere in. Scaffolding does not allow enough room for buggy’s and opposite Severn Trent have obstructed the pavement for ?work. Only option is getting stuck or walking up the road with cars driving down.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Unit 5a, Henrietta Street, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Obstruction by unpermitted skip, scaffolding, building material on pavement

item.title: Extremely LARGE and DANGEROUS hole, just past The Oaklands. Yes, it has been reported already but a programmed repair is not good enough. This could cause a fatality!, 8th December
item.description:
As above. Needs immediate repair or coning off to avoid any accidents.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Badgeworth Road, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: Road works and Bin Men, 8th December
item.description:
The 3 way traffic lights in Parton Road is causing major issues with the bin men. The bin men are driving down Parton Road through the temp lights but stopping at each house meaning traffic is unable to pass. The worse thing is oncoming traffic towards bin lorry can't get through and is now gridlocked. The bin lorry needs to go a different way each Monday and residents putting their bins in one location for duration of the temp lights / roadworks. Its taken me 30 mins to get from coop to Springwell Gardens cut through
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 86, Parton Road, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Information board identifying emergency contact company/number not displayed

item.title: Signage needed to show these are not 3 way lights anymore, 7th December
item.description:
These lights have changed from 3 way to 2 way but coming from Kidnappers Lane you wouldn't know the have changed so you don't expect traffic on A46. Signage needed saying two way signals or that they have changed
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kidnappers Lane, Warden Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: It appears to be a drain cover. The tarmac has sunk round it and gives the appearance now of a pothole with a raised drain cover in the centre, 7th December
item.description:
As you turn left from Pirton Lane onto Cheltenham Road East, it is right on the corner where indicated. Very difficult to avoid unless you take the corner very wide or mount the flat kerb on the left. Am very surprised as the whole junction has just been completed after months of roadworks, moving the bus stop and finishing the cycle lane.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The roundabout has been disrupted for almost 2 months restricting traffic flow, rarely is anyone working on it, it is not on your works map, we are approaching 2 race meeting events that will traffic chaos again, how much longer is this going on ? Can you remove lane restrictions when no one working at least., 7th December
item.description:
Roundabout racecourse entrance

item.title: 30mph/national speed limit signs, 7th December
item.description:
Serious crash. Poles are led on ground for 30mph/national speed limit signs. Bypass just opposite Glos Biz Park heading to Zoons Court. Whilst resolving please collect the SEVEN lots of abandoned signage etc on that bypass reported too many times to mention & all ignored.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Sign structurally damaged/leaning more than 20 degrees/loose in ground (Non illuminating sign)

item.title: Litter bags for collection, 7th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
